busy chan: folks, whats the best option these days for GUI management of a ubuntu server? (managing samba shares, mail server stuff, etc) ?

Depends on if you're managing *one* or *multiple* boxes at once.  I've always found Webmin (webmin.sourceforge.net) to be a great tool when dealing with multiple server boxes (and it works w/ other linuxes as well)
oops, forgot to mention that Webmin is a browser-based utility.  GUI, yes, but ... well, you get the idea.  :)
